Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Netherworld Lane continues to the east and west. About a block to the east, you can start to see the outline of the Necropolis. Rosecrest is a strangely shaped road, running north to south. Taking Rosecrest Street to the north brings you to the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, a moderatly interesting gaming center, similar to the Oceancrest Central Arena, except geared more for one-on-one battle. The games are not as popular with the people, but just as interesting for the competitors.
